response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special price of $9,500. This represents an excellent value considering the product's true worth of $12,000 to you. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
